DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo general anesthesia laparoscopic cholecystectomy high risk postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) . The investigator investigate effect oral IV ramosetron PONV prophylaxis laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Oral Intravenous Ramosetron During Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: ASA III patient , 2565 year , electivelaparoscopic cholecystectomy general anesthesia GI disease , pregnant menstruating , history motion sickness and/or postoperative emesis , antiemetic within 24 h surgery
DOC.keyword: Oral plus IV ramosetron may effective
